name: My Strange Neighbors
description:
My Strange Neighbors - A Puzzle Adventure Game

The Borlan Family and the house disappeared years ago... Some say it reappears every once in a while. 

This is the first game I’ve ever made outside of tutorials. It was made as a final project in the Playcrafting Unity Course. Level 1 is a kind of an escape room challenge. It is part of a much bigger game that I would like to develop.

I have many fixes that I'd like to do including fixing the beginning voice over to start after the start button, a way to quit the game, add rooms and replace some textures, but you'll get the idea.

Keyboard Controls:

  • WASD for Navigation
  • E to Interact
  • Q to Toggle lens
  • Space Bar to Jump

Developed by:

Brian Rardin | @brianrardinnyc on Twitter

Thank you: Rafael Rodriguez, Hessvacio Hassan, Rob Canciello , John Corn and Vinit
